title: I can't see anything.
body:
I can't see my hud, minion/monster hp bars, my minimap and the thingie that you get when you press tab.
alltho I can still see my name, my hp bar and the chat (same goes for other champs, enemies and allies)

replies.body: Oh wow, that's pretty intense.  You might have some driver or game file problems causing this.  Stick to customs for now and go over each step of our [FPS issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752684-Low-Frame-Rate-FPS-Troubleshooting) guide to help tune up your PC settings.  You can also download our [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) incase a reinstall might be necessary here.  I hope that helps!
